scripts.build: cross-var node scripts/updateVersion latest && tiddlywiki wiki --output docs/latest --build index
scripts.release: cross-var node scripts/updateVersion $npm_package_version && tiddlywiki wiki --output docs --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/$npm_package_version && cross-var shx cp docs/index.html docs/$npm_package_version/index.html
